Summary: saw a ship the size of a football field flying ,tw
trends: There have been no other sightings in jonesville
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details i lived in the country at the time,and was on myway to work driving on a dirtroad. there are no lights and its always dark.i allof a sudden felt like i was being watched, so i shut off the car ,got out andlooked up not knowing why.whati saw was huge at least the size of a footballfield, just sitting there, not one sound could be heard. it was black in colorwith very few dim red lights.it sat there about 2min, no i was not afraid, iactually felt at peace. the next thing i know it just took off, heading nw stillnot one sound coming fromit. it went so fast it was out of my sight in less than5seconds with huge red\orange tail trailing behind it. i was amazed, but it wasnot the last time i saw it. about 5yrs later i woke up outside in my yard5b5am5dand saw this huge object leaving me again only this time heading to the ne.dont ask me how i got outside i simply dont know, but there was still calmnessinside of me and i felt sad at its leaving. after these events i would have somereal intense dreams, sometimes seeing other ships only smaller and mettalic incolor. i have never known what to make of this and some people i told justlaughed at me, which is why i have not pursued it until now, i just want to knowif i am the only one who has seen something this huge just hanging out in thesky. thanks for your time kk
